<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hobgoblin Archer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3054)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Bands of hobgoblin soldiers typically have at least one archer among their ranks. In smaller groups, the hobgoblin archer also serves as that band's captain.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Hobgoblin_Archer.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Hobgoblin Archer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3054)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 199 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts), [Scale Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 50

</row>

**Formation** When they're adjacent to at least two other allies, the hobgoblin archer gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 to Reflex saves against area effects.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +14 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8+2 piercing plus crossbow precision

**Crossbow Precision**   The first time the archer hits with a crossbow attack in a round, it deals 1d8 extra precision damage.

**Perfect Aim**   The hobgoblin archer ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition. Their targets don't benefit from [lesser cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459), and they reduce the AC bonus from standard cover by 2 against the hobgoblin archer's attack.

**Running Reload** <actions string="Single Action" />  The archer Strides, Steps, or [Sneaks](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405), then Interacts to reload.

</column>

name: Hobgoblin Archer
